---
title: "api.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines interfaces for FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) client interactions, including a standard client interface and an admin client interface for tenant management. It extends the MedplumClient from the @medplum/core package to provide FHIR-specific functionality.

## Code Structure
The code defines two main interfaces: FhirClient and FhirAdminClient. FhirClient extends MedplumClient, while FhirAdminClient provides methods for tenant management.

## Symbols

### FhirClient
#### Description
An interface that extends MedplumClient, providing FHIR-specific functionality for standard client operations.

#### Inputs
None specified in this interface.

#### Outputs
None specified in this interface.

### FhirAdminClient
#### Description
An interface that defines methods for managing tenants in a FHIR server.

#### Methods

##### createTenant
###### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| org | \{ organizationNumber: number; cxId: string \} | Organization details for tenant creation |

###### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| - | Promise&lt;void&gt; | A promise that resolves when the tenant is created |

##### listTenants
###### Inputs
None

###### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| - | Promise&lt;string[]&gt; | A promise that resolves to an array of tenant IDs |

##### deleteTenant
###### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| org | \{ organizationNumber: number \} | Organization details for tenant deletion |

###### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| - | Promise&lt;void&gt; | A promise that resolves when the tenant is deleted |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| @medplum/core | Provides the MedplumClient class which is extended by FhirClient |

## References
This code is referenced and implemented in other files:

1. packages/api/src/external/fhir/api/api-factory.ts: Provides factory functions to create instances of FhirClient and FhirAdminClient.
2. packages/core/src/external/fhir/api/api-factory.ts: Implements the factory functions using HapiFhirClient and HapiFhirAdminClient.
3. packages/core/src/external/fhir/api/api-hapi.ts: Implements the HapiFhirClient and HapiFhirAdminClient classes.
4. packages/api/src/external/fhir/admin.ts: Uses the FhirAdminClient for tenant management operations.

These implementations and usages provide the concrete functionality for the interfaces defined in this file, including FHIR server interactions and tenant management operations.
